Articles.Content: Okay I've played for quite some time. Took a break then came back. Has KSP gone to .25?? I can't find any information on the threads other the dev notes about it. I looked at the thead dev notes and all it says is go play economic boom. Is that .25? So confused right now!!
Thanks wasn't to sure if it was the same or if it was an add on pack like the NASA one
Nope, full update - the community votes for the best name for an update when some information about it is released. :-)
